thread.title: American Airlines flight to London makes hard landing after being hit by crosswind: video
thread.title_full: American Airlines flight to London makes hard landing after being hit by crosswind: video

author: Greg Wehner
title: American Airlines flight to London makes hard landing after being hit by crosswind: video
text: A London-bound airplane from California made a dicey landing at London Heathrow Airport on Wednesday, as crosswinds appeared to cause the aircraft to tip before touching down and bouncing.Video shows the moment a Boeing 777 operated by American Airlines encountered crosswinds as it made a hard landing at London Heathrow Airport during Storm Gerrit on Wednesday.In the video posted by Big Jet TV, American Airlines Flight 134 is seen coming in for a landing at the major airport just before 11:40 a.m. local time. UNITED FLIGHT FROM LAX TO VANCOUVER MAKES EMERGENCY LANDING OVER ALLEGED BOMB THREAT: REPORT Video shows the moment a Boeing 777 operated by American Airlines encountered crosswinds as it made a hard landing at London Heathrow Airport during Storm Gerrit on Wednesday. (Big Jet TV / Fox News) As the plane approached the runway, it was hit by a gusty crosswind, causing the aircraft to tip left before the pilot appeared to overcorrect right and almost level out before touching the tarmac and bouncing.During the bounce, the front landing gear touched down with such force it caused the nose to bounce up before softly coming back down. ALASKA AIRLINES PASSENGER RECOUNTS HARROWING MOMENTS OFF-DUTY PILOT ALLEGEDLY TRIED TO CUT PLANE'S ENGINES Video shows the moment a Boeing 777 operated by American Airlines encountered crosswinds as it made a hard landing at London Heathrow Airport during Storm Gerrit on Wednesday. (Big Jet TV / Fox News) American Airlines did not immediately respond to inquiries from Fox News Digital on the matter. GET FOX BUSINESS ON THE GO BY CLICKING HERE UPI reported that the weather conditions encountered by the plane were part of a system that brought heavy snow, high winds and rain to parts of Scotland, as well as flooding across the U.K.
